explains: vt. 授予荣誉，使戴桂冠
n. （Laurel）人名；（法）洛雷尔；（英、西、意）劳雷尔

sentences.en: Its huge columns were wreathed with laurel and magnolia.
sentences.cn: 它的巨型立柱被月桂和木兰花环绕着。

sentences.en: She led him round the laurel path and to the walk where the ivy grew so thickly.
sentences.cn: 她领着他绕过月桂树小径，来到长着浓密常春藤的小路上。

sentences.en: Stan Laurel was born at number 3, Argyll Street.
sentences.cn: 斯坦·劳雷尔出生于阿盖尔街3号。
